name: Firesnap
description:
drag mouse to look around
mouse wheel to zoom/unzoom (once you've fullscreened the game)
click to take a picture
space to open/close your album picture

Find all the fireworks to complete your album!
A game made with love by Pauline Gasparini, Lilonna Rondeleux, Mathilde Yernaux and Bastien Loizillon
